name: Out of Space (itch) (JRCarroll)
description:
Newton's Third Law of Motion states that for every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction. Your gun shoots and causes you to knock back. Be careful, unless you want to run into some aliens.

This was made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam while I was gone out of town and I only had about 12 hours of actually working on the game. I will post updates in the future.
